name: Red Roller
description: Red Roller is a 2D puzzle maze game. It features a Red ball with sunglasses who must venture through a series of mazes to reach the end. It will face many challenges and adversaries along the way such as the drone-like 'Spike Ball' or the fortuitous 'Ghost Ball'. Collect all the purple crystals to open the gates to pass through the portal to reach the end! Good luck young roller ;)
